comment.text: Plays an important role in galactose metabolism.

disease.name: Galactosemia
disease.description: Inherited disorder of galactose metabolism that causes jaundice, cataracts, and mental retardation.

comment.text: The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.
Belongs to the galactose-1-phosphate uridylyltransferase type 1 family.

feature.description: In GALCT; affects protein stability; dbSNP:rs111033836.
In GALCT; reduced enzyme activity; dbSNP:rs111033647.
In GALCT; reduced enzyme activity; dbSNP:rs111033663.
In GALCT; affects protein stability; dbSNP:rs367543256.
In GALCT; frequent mutation in African Americans; about 5% of normal galactose uridylyltransferase activity; dbSNP:rs111033690.
In GALCT; 4% of normal activity; dbSNP:rs111033695.
In GALCT; approximately 3% of normal activity; dbSNP:rs111033701.
In GALCT; loss of activity; dbSNP:rs367543258.
In GALCT; loss of activity; dbSNP:rs111033839.
In GALCT; reduced enzyme activity; dbSNP:rs111033715.
In GALCT; reduces strongly galactose uridylyltransferase activity; dbSNP:rs111033718.
In GALCT; loss of activity; dbSNP:rs111033722.
In GALCT; most common mutation; accounts for approximately 70% of GALCT alleles tested; 10% of normal galactose uridylyltransferase activity; impairs protein folding; dbSNP:rs75391579.
In GALCT; no enzymatic activity; dbSNP:rs111033728.
In GALCT; 2-fold decrease in activity; dbSNP:rs111033739.
In GALCT; 3-fold decrease in activity; dbSNP:rs111033747.
In GALCT; 3-fold decrease in activity; dbSNP:rs111033750.
In GALCT; results in no detectable protein in the soluble fraction; dbSNP:rs111033846.
In GALCT; 15% of normal activity; dbSNP:rs111033754.
In GALCT; loss of activity; dbSNP:rs886042070.
In GALCT; 18-fold decrease in activity; dbSNP:rs111033778.
In GALCT; severe; 25-40% of the European population; impairs protein folding; nearly abolishes enzyme activity; dbSNP:rs111033773.
In GALCT; 3-fold decrease in activity; dbSNP:rs111033774.
In GALCT; 2-fold decrease in activity; dbSNP:rs111033841.
In GALCT; allele Duarte; exists as allelic variants Duarte-1 and Duarte-2; Duarte-1 has normal or increased activity; Duarte-2 has activity reduced to about 35-45% of normal; dbSNP:rs2070074.
In GALCT; results in no detectable protein in the soluble fraction; dbSNP:rs111033832.
In GALCT; no enzymatic activity; dbSNP:rs111033800.
